description: Mersea Park is a 13-acre community park located on Mersea Road 2 in Leamington. It features a variety of amenities including a playground, sports fields, and picnic areas. The park is designed for family-friendly activities and community gatherings.
Playground and beach photos by kagazuda via Wikimapia.org. Licensed under CC BY-SA.
Winter photo by Jamie via Flickr, licensed under CC BY 2.0.
